name: Vampire Vermin From Outer Space
description:
I made this game while learning how to make games. You may judge for yourself if I deserved the A I got.  Unfortunately, the class was interrupted by covid, so I don't know how good the game might have been if I had learned everything I could have.

I'm working on sequels that will tie all the games together. I have story boards for 3 or 4 more games.
